      • getParameterFromRequest

        protected javax.ws.rs.core.MultivaluedMap<String,String> getParameterFromRequest(@Nullable
                                                                     R searchRequest)
        Transforms the attributes of the SearchRequest parameter into a map of parameters. The output of this method is intended to be used with the operation WebResource.queryParams(parameters).
        Returns:
        a MultivaluedMap containing the HTTP parameters taken from the SearchRequest object.
